articles.description: MS Dhoni posted the adorable birthday greeting for Dwayne Bravo's mother on Monday. Bravo himself shared the video on his Instagram account.

articles.title: IPL 2023: Poor guys has only kept for 20 overs, Sourav Ganguly defends Sarfaraz Khan after poor outing vs LSG - India Today
articles.description: IPL 2023: People should not read too much into Sarfaraz Khan's performance from the first game, feels Delhi Capitals' Director of Cricket Sourav Ganguly.

articles.title: Manchester United may have wasted four years as Erik ten Hag grows tired - Express
articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag is reportedly growing increasingly fed up with Jadon Sancho and his inconsistency.
articles.content:
With no Champions League football to offer the then-Dortmund star, however, the Red Devils again missed out.

articles.title: Dhoni and CSK recreate old Chepauk magic - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: A crowd of about 35,000 got to watch a massive opening stand, wickets from the CSK spinners, and, of course, the good old Dhoni show
